attributes.action: Stop Forest of Dean Residents from paying to park at local picnic sites.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To use the facilities in the area that are on the doorstep of our homes that we pay for.

If we as residents of the Forest of Dean wish to go to our beauty spots that have always been availiable to us without having to pay the council for parking, then we should be able to do so. 

When I as a tourist am willing to pay for parking costs when i visit other areas in the country, i dont expect to have to pay to visit areas of beauty on my doorstep when i have contributed to the upkeep of the area's through my Council Taxes.
